Text:
If you try to convert this PDF to another format like epub or mobi, please understand the results will be very poor.

I invite anyone with patience to produce a reflowable file and proofread and format it.

My torrent is not from your PDF first of all it's from an epub and I could not convert it and upload it in such a limited time we release our torrents the same day. Your torrent was criticized for bad quality not mine
I haven't seen any criticism of the quality of this file. If anyone finds any problems, please leave a note.
While your torrent file itself is fine, your very halfassed and hardly accurate description of the novel is lacking.
